The PCC wrote to newspaper editors asking them if they were hacking into phones. No, we're not, came the unsurprising reply. The PCC did not even question Clive Goodman 's editor, Andy Coulson , saying that since he had resigned from the paper he was beyond their remit. From this` investigation' the PCC concluded
